1.0:
First Release. Added the following features:
  • Better Icons
  • 'View Logs' Button
  • Cinema Mode Menu Bar
1.1:
Added the following features:
  • Extension Settings
  • Adjustable Link Hitbox
1.2: Settings bugfix and added Cinema Mode Controls feature
1.3: Link hitbox bugfix and new extension icon
2.0:
The following features got merged into official DGG chat, so have been removed:
  • Better Icons
  • 'View Logs' Button
This extension has also been rewritten under the hood, so adding new features should be much easier than before
